text: The Green Party of Switzerland (; ; ; ) is a green political party in Switzerland. The party has 28 seats in the National Council and has 5 seats in the Council of States. The president of the party is Balthasar Gl√§ttli. It was founded in 1983. == Other websites == * Official website * Official website * Official website Category:1983 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Switzerland Category:Political parties in Switzerland Category:Green political parties
